title: Paramour
description: Season Two. Old enemies, new faces...Sophie Morris longs to join the ranks of the most elite personal protection agents in the world: the paramours. Studying hard to earn a spot in their training academy, Sophie catches a surprise assignment at Fantasy Heights learning to please clients and blend in with the other performers.Sophie knows better than to expect an easy road ahead, and Fantasy Heights doesn't disappoint. Her sexual education becomes a glittering, seductive distraction. Clients and coworkers make it impossible to remain as detached as she should, and challenge the future she thought she wanted.EPISODE TEN: PARAMOURParamour-hopeful Sophie Morris arrives at Fantasy Heights. Ordered to please her clients and blend in with her coworkers, Sophie must battle against a distrustful nature to befriend a feisty lead performer and open herself up to new sexual experiences.
author: Meg Silver
